mapper.insert: INSERT INTO DOCUMENTFORM ( FORM_ID, FORM_NAME, DESCRIPTION, FORM_CONTENTS ) VALUES ( (SELECT NVL(MAX(FORM_ID), 0) + 1 FROM DOCUMENTFORM ), #{formName}, #{description}, #{formContents} )
mapper.select: SELECT ROW_NUM, FORM_ID, FORM_NAME, DESCRIPTION, FORM_CONTENTS FROM (SELECT ROWNUM ROW_NUM , A.* FROM (SELECT * FROM DOCUMENTFORM ORDER BY FORM_ID) A ) B WHERE ROW_NUM BETWEEN #{first} AND #{last}
SELECT FORM_ID, FORM_NAME, DESCRIPTION, FORM_CONTENTS FROM DOCUMENTFORM WHERE FORM_ID = #{formId}
